name: Plantasia Synthesis
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING * Seriously

this game was crafted from scratch for Rainbow Jam 2017 in 16 days

In Plantasia Synthesis, you will find yourself hacking into a plant.  Through the power of your high tech computer, you will "jack in" and mind-meld with nature in a way humankind never has before.  Inside, you will experience music, sound, light, and color.  #hacktheplant

Plantasia Synthesis is a meditative 3D musical shooter.  There is no way to lose, and is about enjoying the experience.

controls are WASD + Mouse, simple!

The Objective:  Complete the hack.  Shoot down nodes & collect the data they drop.

The Real Objective:  Relax and have fun.  

Thanks for playing!  I welcome all feedback.

The team:

code / graphics / design - Russell Sullivan (myself) aka ahintoflime 

music / sound - Bond Miller
